data.name: Booty Calls - Lulu Furry Pack
data.detailed_description:
Booty Calls is a cool dating simulator with a unique puzzle mechanic in which you help mermaid princess Andriella collect all the pussy juice in town! Get to know a bunch of hot chicks, date them and then bang all of them in this addictive adult game!

The latest Booty Calls DLC introduces you to the playful Lulu, a kinky cat girl who will do anything to get her master’s attention, so make sure you take good care of this purrfect companion.

Join the hotties of Naughty Beach today!
